title: Hello! Chinese Minecraft players
author: Lancasters
txt_content:
Hello! Everyone
I'm a Minecraft player from Mexico. I have learnt Chinese for 1 year.To make more progress,I found this forum from minecraftforum.I will be one of you.
Hope I can get along well with everyone in MCBBS

replies.author: 莉莉霍瓦特
replies.txt_content:
我学习了8年汉语，到现在考试都不可能满分←_←
嘿！看过三重否定句吗？
我今天不得不 不去商店。
四重否定句：
我今天不得不不可能不去商店。

你可能已经晕了，但这还有更有趣的在中文中。
比如：三叠字：鑫森淼焱垚
四叠字:?燚

I believe you can study Chinese well.

中共中央编译局在《中央文献重要术语译文发布（2015年第七期）》[1]  中，将这两句诗作为重要术语，发布了官方版本的翻译：
“Were it to benefit my country I would lay down my life;
What then is risk to me?”
苟も国家に利すれば生死を以てす、岂祸福に因りて之を避趋するや（国に利することであれば命をかけて行う、自分の祸福を理由にそれを避けたりなどしない）

replies.author: langyo_v3
replies.txt_content:
Welcome,Lancasters!

You seem to need read it:www.mcbbs.net/thread-412111-1-1.html
This is the biggest topic about the forum's history.It can help you to learn more about this place,and more new special Chhnese style!

Let me introduce you some new friends,they are friendly and also can speak English loudly.They can help you when you have any problems in Chinese and Forum.
@FHC红石 He is one of the webmasters.He is good at redstone and command block.He is helpful and resolves over 1400 problems on this site.You can ask problems to him,and he can gives you the good reply~
@混乱 He's the main webmaster on this site.Usually the important messages comes form him.Pay more attention to him~
@ustc_zzzz Eh...He is also a webmaster.He is very good at English,and he often translates the technical articles.We often called him "4z".

If you have some problem about the forum,you can release new topic at Q&A section.

Limited space,that so much for that.
My English is not loudly,I hope you never mind it.XD
Have a good time!
:-)
